data.title: Harvey Goldsmith
data.text:
Jools Holland

One of the UK’s most popular pianist and bandleader, Jools Holland OBE, returns to the UK to perform 33 shows including two dates at London’s Royal Albert Hall on Friday 25th and Saturday 26th of November. Featuring special guests The Selecter’s Pauline Black and Arthur ‘Gaps’ Hendrickson as well as Ruby Turner, Louise Marshall and Beth Rowley, Jools will be performing tracks spanning his entire musical career.
